website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice of you're looking for a budget-friendly orthopedic cat bed that doesn't cut corners on comfort or support. An open front and shallow sides allow cats to enter and exist with ease.
pros: Medical-grade orthopedic foam promotes even weight distribution and relieves joint pressure
Low-profile suede side bolsters offer back and head support
Faux fur sleeping surface cover is soft and comfortable
Available in a variety of sizes and colors
cons: Cats who value their privacy might prefer higher bolsters
Cover feels a little thin along the sides

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd absolutely loves it! I got the jumbo size, he's a 90lb dog... just for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Perfect for our Elder Doberman!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this bed for our doberman. He is an elder dog who is terminal and needs an extra cozy bed as he is very thin, achy and needs the support. He wagged his lil nub tail and walked right over to the bed as soon as I unpacked it. He was excited and hopped right on. I swear he slept hours before moving which is rare for him. The bed was ultra cozy, soft, plush, comfortable and relaxing for our doberman. We all loved the color and style! Has a nice pillow lip along the bed which is perfect for when he wants to rest his head. He LOVES it, we LOVE it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Maria De Jesus Berry

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves Her New Bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES her new bed! Sizing is just right. The large is perfect for her. She is 49 pounds. A Bassett Chow mix.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Aussie Dog LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this for fear that I'd end up with an egg crate bed - check the description of the style to be sure, but I ordered the Deluxe Chaise and the inside is definitely thick memory foam topped with the cooling gel foam. I have a dog who regularly chooses to lie on cold tile to stay cool, and he took to the bed immediately. I have a 50lb Australian Shepherd who likes to sprawl out, and the Jumbo is probably bigger than he needs, but I don't regret it! Much better quality bed than similar styles in chain stores that go for double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, jumbo size is huge!
customer_reviews.text: My 85 lb labrador mix is comfy as can be on the Jumbo size. I was pleasantly surprised at how big this bed actually is, - bigger than the XL beds I have seen elsewhere. She can spread out on this one. She's an old dog and seems to find this bed very easy on her old bones. I don't know yet what the longevity will be, but have bought more expensive beds that didn't last long, so if I get a year out of this one I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Dogs are big fans!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great bed! The day I got it, my dog went right to it and didn't get off for 7-8 hours! One of my dogs has a limp in her back leg, so the egg crate bottom is great for her muscles to relax on! The other dog doesn't even get to use it sometimes because her sister just sprawls out on it! I ordered a medium, but the bed was too small for my two dogs, so I returned it and got a large instead. WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE! Not a problem at all! (for size reference in the picture, my dogs are both 9-13 lbs, maltese-havanese mix)
customer_reviews.author: kt fong

customer_reviews.title: Not "orthopedic" like I though it'd be
customer_reviews.text: Not "orthopedic" like I though it'd be. Its eggcrate and foam. But for as inexpensive as it was, can't really complain. I am removing one star because I was to set reasonable expectations. The fabric is well suited for non destructive dogs. I would probably handwash as well. As for Ezra... he seems to be excited. And its freaking HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Southerland

customer_reviews.title: BEST pet item we have ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a ton of trouble finding a dog bed that wasn't hideous and cheap looking. This bed is the real deal! It is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. It looks very sleek and modern, and thanks to the non-skid stickers we put on the feet, it doesn't go flying across the nice hardwood floor every time our dog jumps out of bed. We have already had it for a couple of months and we are really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dog bed at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My pup LOVES his new bed it looks great and seems like great quality. The mattress is thick and the cover is easily taken off to be washed I have washed the cover once inside out on a delicate cycle and it came out good as new smelling fresh again still nice and soft on top. Size reference my dog is a lab Great Dane mix about 60 pounds right now he takes up half the large size bed curled up and the whole length of it when he lays stretched out
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rexer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste! Listen to the one star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not made for large dogs....maybe not even dogs. The material comes apart as soon as you get it. Sorry guys, I'm not exaggerating :( I patched this thing 8 times in a month. AND that's not counting the stitching, it was horrible! The "fur" material is SOOOOO thin it is very easy for a dog nail to poke it open. The material is so thin any liquid soaks in right to the foam. I went to unzip it to wash it and the foam inside was filthy. All within a month of owning. I threw it away. I fell for It looking nice with a good price. I should have listen to other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Cat is loving it
customer_reviews.text: Got the small size for my elderly cat. She quickly adopted it. Now it is her preferred place to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: AvidGamerGirl

customer_reviews.title: The bed sheds
customer_reviews.text: If your dog - like many other dogs - likes to scratch its sleeping area in order to get comfy before going to sleep do not purchase this bed!!! My room has literally been turned into a fabric warzone because the top fluffy layer of fabric that covers the bedding is everywhere. This would been a better product if it was made to withstand the wear and tear of an animal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but BUYER BE WARE
customer_reviews.text: VERY cheaply constructed. The " orthopedic foam" is nothing but cheap egg create foam. The outer cover is pretty nice but the very first time I took it off **TODAY** 6/3/2018 I discovered the egg crate foam and that the "bumper cushion's" outer casing was so thin and cheaply made it had already disintegrated **See photos** this was just purchased in late February and our puppies have only been allowed to lay on them about 4 times as a reward since they are babies and not yet potty trained. ***It is now 11/14/18 and vendor is will not return calls, respond to this feedback or make any attempts to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: RGarou

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: my 70 lbs puppy loved it from day one, after long walks he would go on his new bed and sleep for hrs. after three weeks of use i decided to remove the cover for wash and i was surprised and disappointed with the condition of the foam, its literally falling apart i project in 6 months the foam will disintegrate. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND GO TO A DIFFERENT PRODUCT THIS WAS A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: niket saraf

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: So first, I'll say the pattern is adorable and the bed looked nice. However, less than a day after it arrived, my great dane ate it. I still made her sleep on it just to prove my point. Here's what I've also noticed: This bed isn't terribly different than most dog beds you can find in Marshall's. Sure, it comes in XL for like $43, which is nice, but the foam isn't super dense, so I don't think my danes love it like they would some of those $250 beds. However, I'm not buying one of those until she stops tearing them apart.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guilmain

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: Lacy's first impression review...she really likes it! She eagerly watched me set it down and sat on it before i was even done positioning it. She is a greyhound. She's a petite girl at 25in tall, 64lbs. I got her the jumbo size. Day 2, yup she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The bed’s comfortable, our dog liked it
customer_reviews.text: The bed’s comfortable, our dog liked it. The problem is that our dog is still a puppy (a big one) and he destroyed it in a couple of days, material is too soft so he easily inserted his teeth and pulled, I just heard the “crack” and in that second the bed was trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Dream Bed
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs. This is the perfect size for one. This product is so nice I purchased two. Very strong wood like material. Goes with espresso furniture well. It also has a great lift off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Style

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed and so does my puppet, there's only a few issues, the stiching is stretched out and busted in a few areas, the cover doesn't fit perfectly so it gives it a saggy loose look, and overall it's not amazing quality materials. That being said if life was perfect I'd have bought him a 70 dollar bed but this it's great for now and he seems to like it, I got the large for my olde English bulldog, perfect size
customer_reviews.author: KyleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPERS WILL NOT WORK! Very disappointed and had to throw ours away!
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this bed I was very pleased! It was big and the dogs loved it. However last week our puppy had an accident on it and I thought oh well ill just unzip it and take it apart to clean it. Come to find out THE ZIPPERS WILL NOT COME UNZIPPED!!!!!!! So I was not able to take it apart to make it fit in the washer and be cleaned. We ended up having to throw it away since we were not able to get the zippers undone without breaking them. Very disappointing. Not quite sure who would make a dog bed that doesn't break down to be able to be washed,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Visible Outside Frame NOT Bamboo - Hardware Missing and Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere the description says bamboo but the part of the bed that actually is seen, the box, is cheap looking laminate looking veneer. Read the fine print it is mentioned once that it is veneer everywhere else its say bamboo this and bamboo that. To add insult to injury you would for the price they would make sure all the hardware is in the box but they shorted us on the screws not hard to fix but really annoying. Finally the sides do not line up after screwing together. However, we are not in a position to return it right now because we really need something. We will look for something else in the meantime. Will add photos later.
customer_reviews.author: StressFreeLiving

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very particular about his bed. When trying to replace his old worn out one, he has refused to lie on the new ones we have bought him. However, he took to this one right away. It looks like the filling is an "egg crate" type of padding. The cover where it is "furry" is very soft, but also seems to be very warm (so not the best in the hot weather). It is also very large and takes up quite a bit of room (but the perfect size for our German Shepherd mix). Overall - this was a great purchase and our dog really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Wembley slept so well!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bed yesterday & Wembley slept so well last night. Before he’d get up to adjust himself turning round & round then a loud plop back down. I heard him get up once & when he layed back down it was a soft sound because the construction is so good with the egg crate foam. Heck his 120# body doesn’t even sink all the way to the floor like other ones we’ve tried. Didn’t take him long to realize its comfort including the bolsters for his head. He loves it! That being said if its longevity ends up being a short period of time I’ll edit to let you know, but for now! 5 huge stars!
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Used dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed. All of the good reviews had me SO excited for this. The package came a day late. I understand, given the circumstances, that that’s to be expected. No harm, no foul. But it came in a box, stuff in there. It looks like it’s been used. Everyone else who posted their unboxing had a tag on their dog bed, and a protective wrap. Mine had neither, and it smells like gasoline. I just wanted a replacement, but I could find out how to do that, so I had to return. Not sure what to do now. Was really looking forward to this dog bed for my aging dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Our RR loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, for the price this bed is pretty great. Would buy again and again. Our Rhodesian Ridgeback/Pitt mix (about 60 pounds) fits perfectly on the large with some room to spare (she likes to sleep curled up, if she was a dog that liked to sleep stretched out, it probably wouldn't be big enough). totally recommend. Also I have no idea why my pictures are upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Rusty is about 55 pounds and the Large was a perfect fit. I could have probably gotten away with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Dog Rusty and I was blown away. I had low expectations cause of the price, but its really thick and soft and the edges are firm and hold up very well. Rusty is about 55 pounds and the Large was a perfect fit. I could have probably gotten away with the Medium but I figured a little big is better than a little small. Rusty is hot natured and normally prefers to lay on the hardwood floor, but for some reason this bed must just be perfect, cause he lays on this most of the time now. I would HIGHLY recommend this bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE Four Orders - Four VERY Different Beds
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bed and recieved the one on the bottom left. Good quality foam, solid cushions on the side, my dog loved it. I ordered a 2nd one for another room and received a totally misshapen one. Exchanged it and received the one on the top left. Smaller, thinner foam and flimsy. Requested an exchange again and received the worst one yet on the right. It's even smaller, foam was thinner and the cushions on the side were not even half full. Theres also a weird stitch line in the middle of the bed. So disappointing, my dog really loved the first bed. If only they can get their quality control in check.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed and my baby approves!
customer_reviews.text: He loves his new bed frame and mattress pad. Both are great! If your dog chews wood it would not be a great choice most likely but if yours like mine is a good little boy this is a great little bed. This is the small size and he is a Japanese Chin for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Total rip off
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for a new puppy. The dog would have nothing to do with it yet was sleeping everywhere else. I would witness the dog smelling it and walking away. I decided to wash the cover. When I took the cover off I discovered that the egg crate foam had been eaten in the center. There was dog hair which did not match my dog because my dog never used it. Apparently someone had allowed their dog to urinate on the foam, eat the foam, and then replace the cover and return it for credit. I have chosen to write it off and not return it as I do not want someone else to be ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: John N Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It arrives totally disassembled.
customer_reviews.text: It comes completely disassembled. Every little piece has to be put together. I’m SO tired of ordering stuff that has a lot of small pieces that have to be screwed, bolted, or nailed together. When I opened the end of the very heavy box and saw all that mess, I closed it back up and shipped it back. Not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grube

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BED. My shiba absolutely adores it. The bed arrived today in a huge box. It was in perfect condition. Super comfortable and soft. The foam does not seem to be lose cut bits which i love. I actually ordered 2 the smaller one for my yorkie should be here tomorrow. For the shiba i ordered a jumbo. He has been on it since it got home. He's twisted and turned and still has room even shared with his brother for tbe night. I love how the cover is removable so that i can wash it. So far nothing bad to say. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: First, I had to reinforce this with extra wood to even make this appropriate for my dog to sleep on. The slats provided are so shaky/wabbly that he wouldn't even attempt to get on it. Second, even after I reinforced it, it was still uncomfortable (and I purchased the mattress that this company sells to go with it. All in all this was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TKPics616

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves his new bed..it doesn't sink in like regular dog beds. I ordered the light blue but the color is actually darker which I'm glad so it doesn't get too dirty
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo-Grey
customer_reviews.text: It's huge! I was worried the large wouldn't be big enough, but it's like a king size bed for my almost 6 year old boxer. She approves and so does mommy! I'll give it 5 stars after its been used for a while and goes through a wash. It doesn't look promising, but this has always been an issue for me through the years. 4 stars for now! Update 9/4/17- it's been through hell and back with quite a few washes and is still holding up amazing and looks brand new. Best dog bed I've ever purchased. I changed my rating to 5 stars. Amazing bed and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Smiley likes it but ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog does love this bolster bed. Having said that, I did remove the cover to wash it when it arrived and noticed that while the foam may be made in the USA, the filler in the bolster is made in China and full of some matted material that looks like it came from a recycling plant. I am ordering some cotton ticking to replace it with and would say to the manufacturers the following: some of us would happily pay more to have a bed fully made in the USA that does not contain some unknown material from overseas.
customer_reviews.author: LGriffith

customer_reviews.title: Our Doberman Is Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our old Doberman and he likes it a lot. He has not tried to chew on it, so I don't really know if it is chew proof, but it is certainly comfortable and pleasing to him. I wish it was a little thicker, but for the price, it is understandable that it isn't. The thicker beds were more expensive. He sleeps on this every night. We got brown so that it wouldn't discolor and it hasn't. Overall good. Would buy again and we may get this one again if this one gets too worn down.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not as described at all.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I read through tons of reviews and settled on this product. Despite saying there is a 3 inch thickness on the sleep area, there is no more than 1.5 inches of foam. And it does not seem like any memory foam I’ve ever seen. In fact, I question if this is the foam that should have been in the bed casing since it doesn’t fit well (there is much more case for the foam than there is foam. I purchased the deep pool color in the large size.
customer_reviews.author: VolkMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was sketched out a minute, then I read some reviews and said screw it and bought it. I got the plush grey jumbo bed and it’s actually perfect for my 170lb Great Dane! We’ve gone through about 10 beds and he didn’t like any of them. Now he’ll just go lay in this one on his own. It’s a little flimsy around the edges, but no problems yet! Can take off the cover to wash it also. Great product, but I’m sure in a year it’ll be beaten up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems comfy
customer_reviews.text: Attractive. Kind of like a mid-century mod addition to my home. I wanted something that my senior dog could easily climb onto and have a higher degree of comfort (that's her nosey baby sister in the photo). This seems to fit the bill. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: missclarabow

customer_reviews.title: Not orthopedic. Not plush. Very cheaply made. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is not orthopedic foam. It is also not plush nor supportive. It basically doesn’t match the description whatsoever. It’s a bait and switch. The side “bolsters” are not bolstering anything. They are flat like pancakes. The “orthopedic foam” is not orthopedic. It’s cheap foam. I lightly press with my light hand and it straight down to the ground. Using an egg carton as bedding would be better than this. There is no way this can “support” any dog heavier than 5 lbs. Maybe they changed their product or something but this piece of junk is going back. Waste of time. Don’t fall for it, piece of junk. I got tricked.
customer_reviews.author: Ho C

customer_reviews.title: Bed is Nice But Not That Large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a dog bed about 10 years ago that was just awesome. Unfortunately, such a product is no longer available. So after much review, I settled on this one. It is not nearly as nice as my previous one. However, I like that you can unzip the outer material to wash. It is ok as far as support but could be better. My advice is to really look at the dimensions. This is considered a large bed. My 12 pound puppy covers most of the bed when she stretches out. I cannot imagine this bed is big enough for a large dog especially the width.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Discolored and sad
customer_reviews.text: After undoing the wadded up plastic bag it came in...seriously no box just it smushed into a ball, I was further underwhelmed by the discolored foam. I’m assuming the blue foam side which is discolored and yellow is the “cooling” side though it feels exactly like the discolored tan side. There are loose threads and feats everywhere but seriously that’s the cooling gel orthopedic foam? In my defense, I didn’t pull out the foam to see that it’s discolored, it comes separated and you have to stuff the foam in the frayed cover on your own. It’s such horrible quality and there’s no excuse for the gross discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our pups (63 and 75 lbs) and they both love them! They are good quality and relatively easy to clean. I give them a decent vacuum, unzip, and then stick them in the wash and bingo, good as new. Our dogs up until now seemed to want to destroy every dog pillow we've brought home but something about this couch design the dogs treated these like beds and not toys immediately. The price is so reasonable for these, I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kira H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love their memory foam beds. I both got them a Jumbo so they can lay comfortably. These beds are wonderful, and finally my dogs can enjoy their own bed. The only problem I did not like was how they were mailed to me. Both beds in separate boxes were smashed and both beds weren't formed right. I had to take everything apart to fluff it, reorganize it, and make it flush. So they need to think of a better way to mail these beds without the hassel of a smashed bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nestle

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Love the bed at first, perfect for both my dogs... but 2 weeks into having it, both zippers on the back busted. So it's a matter of time before it will be in the trash. So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Sara urban

customer_reviews.title: Can not sufficiently clean
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my dogs to lay use on our hardwood floors. At first they seemed to be great, they were super cushiony and the material was soft and my dogs loved them. Well one of my dogs has accidents and I needed to wash the bed, the cover is easy to come off but the pee soaked the pad underneath. No amount of scrubbing or machine washing could get this clean. The other bed has a stained pad just from my dog laying on it. I assumed that this would be an easy product to clean since it is made for pets but I was wrong and will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like it looks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this morning and it's not at all like it looks on line. That one looks firm and the headrest look firm. The one I got was a flimsy maybe 1 inch with almost nothing in the headrests around it, just loose material. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Prather

customer_reviews.title: Pet bed
customer_reviews.text: My Siberian Husky/Canaan dog loved this bed! Its firm but soft, it has a rolled edge that he can rest against, lay across, or snuggle into. Its very roomy. My dog is a larger dog who weighs on average 75 lbs. I can lay beside him on the bed. I am 5'3 and approx. 145 lbs. There is room for me to lay beside him comfortably. This gives you an idea of the bed size. Keep the size in mind when thinking about where you will be placing the bed. Your dog will probably love it as mine does! I bought based on the size chart by breed/ weight provided by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it but zipper failed.
customer_reviews.text: This might have been my dogs' favorite bed ever. They used it daily. It had the best of both worlds...they could stretch out when they wanted and also elevate their head when they wanted. I also was able to vacuum it pretty clean. The only problem was the zipper that failed way too soon. It didn't fail from me opening the zipper, it failed during regular use. My dogs are older so all they did was lay on it. But when the zipper failed, they found it irresistible to tear apart the inside stuffing when I wasn't around. The mess was a a disaster. It's a shame, they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any padding and the bolsters are not strong enough to keep a dog's head up. I was very disappointed in this bed and returned it immediately. If you have ever purchased an orthopedic bed for your dog, you will not be impressed with this bed. My dog is 40 lbs and he couldn't even stretch out on it.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The directions were helpful and easy for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about putting this together. But, the directions were super clear and every part was marked. It was easy for me to put together. All the pre-drill holes lines up perfect. The bed came together feeling sturdy. Thanks for taking the time to label all the parts so clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This comes vacuum sealed and then expands over time. It was way too big for us (Jumbo Plus), so we only had it open for a few days before trying to crunch it back into a box (no fun). The mattress was decent after giving time to "settle," but not as good as the Friends Forever one (which is quite a bit more expensive), which we've had for a couple of years and still like (too small now). The bumper seemed pretty deflated upon opening and didn't really come back noticeably over the few days... maybe some work could be done to poof it up more over time?
customer_reviews.author: withonen

customer_reviews.title: 4 paws of approval! (5 stars)
customer_reviews.text: The dog pictured did not come with the bed. That was disappointing. Once we got over that, my dog and I love this bed. We can cuddle for hours. Have had to was it once- I drool a lot- she gets irritated and wants a clean bed. It comes apart easily, foam got a little wet- HEAVY drooled that I am. I rinsed the inner foam I. The shower and it air dried quickly. The covering laundered in the washer and dryer without issue and went back together easily. Good as new. Fur baby has now banned me from sleeping with her now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not food quality.
customer_reviews.text: Should of returned it. A hole in it but didnt notice right off. The dogs wont lay on them unless i pile them on top of each other. They flatten out like nothing so i would say the thickness is really not orthopedic grade. False advertising. Only thing that was tru was the color blue it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amberella

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed which I would have taken a picture of how it was shipped. I had to assemble it myself. It was all in pieces. The edge part of the cushion is actually chopped up foam and filled at 1/2 the capacity it should be. The cushion on the bottom does not even lay flat to the floor because it was so squished during shipping. I guess u pay for what u get. I got the small size for my cat since she keeps stealing my dogs bed. She is not complaining but don’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good cat bed
customer_reviews.text: I have a photo that sadly I can't find a way to upload. Right out of the box (literally) , the cats came to investigate. I put it on my bed while deciding where to put it. My elder cat crawled in and has yet to move. I guess that's approval. It's small. If you have a dog larger than a toy breed, don't bother. It's attractive. Regular foam. With enough of a back for a cat to cuddle. I would recommend for any normal sized cat. It's worth the cost. Not ergonomic. That's a silly claim.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. I have a 60lb border collie, 35lb mini aussie, and a new mini aussie puppy and they all use this bed. I think they love that it is soft and fleecy because it is comforting to them. I have the jumbo and it fits my two larger dogs together (without too much extra room between them). It is almost 3 years old and still looks like new. It is very well made and has resisted some potty accidents! I love the shape and size because it fits in our dormer in our bedroom. I definitely recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for a Large Dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES his new big bed! My 55lb shepherd mix fits on this bed with room to share with his 50lb pitbull friend! Can easily fit two "large" dogs or one Great Dane sized dog on this jumbo sized bed. I love that I can unzip and wash the cover separately, and remove the sofa cushion siding if needed. I have already recommended this product to my friends and have had two of them buy it after seeing mine! Highly recommend you give this bed a try for your pup!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting! Flea infested
customer_reviews.text: Should have known this disgusting bed would have issues. It came taped in an already opened plastic bag and then in another already opened plastic bag under that. After cutting through a 5 year old’s tape job, got the bed out. Seems fine. An hour later, dog is scratching and itching all over. She has fleas! Open the bed up and all around the foam are adult fleas and flea feces. This is atrocious and disgusting. Would rate 0 stars if I could. Would burn the bed but I want my money back for this crap to offset the vet bills.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have four pugs - 2 are seniors and suffering incontinence. It was sad to ban them from the front room furniture. Bought one of these - and once received bought two more! Absolutely wonderful - very well-made, it unzips allowing removal of the foam! After an accident I tossed the entire bed in the washing machine then removed the cover - set aside the foam pieces to air-dry and put the cover in the dryer. Once everything was dry - zipped back together. Good as new! Absolutely great purchase, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Sparky instantly loved this bed! He is a 35 lb golden doodle and fits perfectly on the large (I went back and form between jumbo and large - glad I got large!). It’s soft, cushy, and has a the egg crate cushions that I can trust really provide support. Sparky is still a young boy, but we want to help him out with joint support as early as possible! Highly recommend this bed. I scoured Amazon for weeks and this truly was the highest rated, true to its name bed. And now I have it I can agree! My only gripe is the color. It’s a very blue grey - but you can’t be too picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amesue

customer_reviews.title: She loves it! Especially the pillow edges!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is well made, and a high quality item. It's soft and very cushiony. My border collie takes long naps on it and loves the pillow edges to rest her head. I got the large and it's the perfect size for her at 50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie lowrey

customer_reviews.title: cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large for my 40-lb rescue mutt and he fits perfectly in it. So does my 4-lb kitten. My dog likes the rest his head on pillows, so the pillowed edges are perfect for him. I know some reviews have said that the bed is not as cushy as it advertises, but it works well for my dog. Although, when I step on it my foot hits the floor, when my dog lays in the bed it seems to cushion him well. I have 100+ pounds heavier than he is.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs absolutely love them, time will tell how long they last
customer_reviews.text: Giving 5 stars even though we haven’t had these for even an hour yet. My dogs absolutely freaked when we took these out of the box, as you can see from the photos. They weren’t on the ground for 5 seconds before they jumped in them. Jack loves them so much he wants two at the same time. I’ve never seen him so excited. The overall quality is pretty darn good for the price but I do see loose stitching and less than top quality seams. I know they won’t last forever but for 2 jumbos for $70 it really can’t be beat. Best Christmas ever for my big pups.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic dog bed at a nice price. My dog Aries was super excited about it as soon as I took it out of the box--he plopped right down on it! The material is REALLY nice and soft, and it seems well put together. I will have to see how easy it is to clean, but so far I am very pleased with my purchase--and more importantly, so is Aries! My dog is 60lbs. I got him the Jumbo sized dog bed because he is pretty lanky. I'm glad I went for the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry J.

customer_reviews.title: great bed that arrives dramatically vacuum-sealed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is great quality but a medium was not big enough for my 42 lb husky. She absolutely loves it though, and it’s a good and sturdily stuffed. A note for buyers: When this arrives it will be in the smallest, strangest ball-shape you’ve ever seen in your life. A warning label will say something like, ‘Don’t open me aggressively!’ assumably because they’ve airvacc’d the bed into the size of a tumored cantaloupe. Opening will be great fun, if not a tad traumatic. Don’t let the package smell your fear.
customer_reviews.author: FictionReborn

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my dog because his old one was falling apart. The design is really good. I like how easy it is to wash this. I cannot say much about whether it's chew resistance because he doesn't have any teething issues. He loves it and adjusted to the bed really quick. Pay attention to the sizing chart, it is pretty accurate. I sized up because I wanted my dog's bed to be spacious.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, appears to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's always a challenge buying beds online for pets, usually they arrive a bit undersized from their description but this was right-on. Actually, even a bit larger that expected and the dog has taken to it rather quickly, no new-bed smell that often has turned them off. I'm even purchasing a second one to replace a worn-out bed that I keep in the office for her. Oh, it's a female Borzoi (for size comparison).
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Argo

customer_reviews.title: Decline in quality
customer_reviews.text: This was my THIRD purchase of this same dog bed. The first two were of good quality and perfect right out of the box. The third bed was compacted into a very small box and even after being open for a week, the wrinkles never came out of the fabric or the padding. The base padding was one full inch thinner than the first two beds and the rail padding did not fill out the cover. Will NOT be ordering more of this brand dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: CJW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for pups, but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, and first of all, even though I ordered two of the same thing, two completely different beds arrived. One came in a large Amazon box, the other was stuffed into what looked like a trash bag with a shipping label slapped on. The beds are comfortable for my dogs (they seemed really happy), but after only a week of use, the zipper on one broke when I tried to take the cover off for washing, and the other had torn. Really poor quality. Inside is just a piece of foam like you would use for a mattress topper. Sad to return these, but the quality really isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent purchase! My 80 pound dog go can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase! My 80 pound dog go can fit comfortably, BUT both he and my 45 pound doodle can fit in side-by-side snuggles (when the mood strikes them). Bed arrived in a big box, nor smushed, no weird “factory” chemical smell either. I washed it anyway, and it came out even softer than before! Both dogs had their doubts about the egg carton foam, but after they discovered the luxury of an orthopedic “mattress”, life hasn’t ever been sweeter or as well-rested! I’ve included a photo of the love of my life in his bed, just because he’s so darn adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So soft. great bed for a large dog. We have a greyhound and she loves her bed. She digs at it a couple times every night before she lays down to make it better, of course. So after about 6 months she had dug a hole through. About that time some of the padding is wearing and the whole thing smells like dog so we toss and buy a new one. Compared to the super plush ones for $120 at the box store this isnt as thick, but it is soo soft and you can buy 4 of them for the same price. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Carraway

customer_reviews.title: cheap fabric not supportive
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is made of cheap material and not orthopedic. It is not good quality padding either, not orthopedic, i have to put another bed on top of it to make it softer. My dog is a 45lb plot and she likes to scratch and she tore through this bed very quickly after only a few months and now has multiple holes in the middle. We have two other dogs who wont even go near it. All dogs nest and it should be durable enough to account for scratching and not rip that easily. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hutchason

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER PROOF. FOAM QUICK TO ABSORB DOG SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Soooo p**. I did not see this was not water proof. I have two mastiff pups who drool and are being potty trained. they drooled through the cover to the “foam” inside. They also peed on it and it went right through to the pad. Even if they hadn’t peed on it, I can’t imagine this thing lasting long either way. Because the cover isn’t water proof- that means dog smell, drool, slobber, hair is going to seep through to the foam causing it to accumulate bacteria and stink to high heaven. Mistake buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.FiveO

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product today. Let it rest for the whole day before I give it to my dogs. Thinking I need it to do it since is memory foam. I don’t see any memory foam or cooling gel. It’s a simple sponge. One on top of the other. The outsite material it’s very soft but the inside it’s just sponge. The lilt pillow around the bed it’s soft and doesn’t stay up around the bed and I would say it’s smaller because it’s not completely full around the bed. I will be returning this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a different brand but looked very similar prior to purchasing this one. The other was great. This one I highly doubt will with stand the weight of my greyhounds, the fill is not very strong at all. If your dog likes to scratch the bed prior to laying down as mine does, and the cover is coming all apart, then don't buy this one. It's very cheap looking and holding up to that same standard.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed investment ever.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for Christmas for my 2 cats. I got the medium size and let me tell you. I wish I could sleep in it. My older 19lb took to it right away. She kneaded it and chittered away while snoozing. My kitten goes to it sometimes but he rather my bed. I would and have recommended this bed and will get more in the future. So soft and the egg crate memory foam is like a top grade luxury. In the picture is my 19lb tux/tortie Zelda. Tell me she doesn't look happy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: s.stancati

customer_reviews.title: Helping an elderly dog find comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter's dog. Ever since she got this bed, her dog sleeps like the dead! Like seriously, she’s almost given her a heart attack a few times from how deeply she was snoozing, whereas with her previous bed, she’d wake up at the slightest disturbance. She’s a small elderly dog with some pretty bad arthritis, and this bed seems to have eased some of her pain. It has made sleeping much more comfortable for her. Very easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: RaineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price of $38, not as pillowy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Its eehhh. I would Be more please with it based on seeing it in person if it was $10 less. Cheap materials, and def not as “pillowly” as it appears online. I think it will be pretty flat after a month of our 50# laying on it. Seems like a typical “walmart” dog bed but for way too much. It does not come wrapped in plastic as other beds I have received from amazon— but squeezed as tight as humanly possibly into a box. A long brown human hair was on it upon opening—- yyuuck!, and the egg crate inside the cover is severely, > 70%, discolored with bright yellow and also pink. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not just for the dog...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Husky perfectly and she loves to sleep on it at night. She is not a small Husky. She is a husky Husky because she hates running and enjoys food. She's also scared of snow so... irony? Anyway, she's 9 this year and I wanted her to have a comfortable bed that she didn't have to climb up to get to. She loves this bed... and so do my children. When she's not on it they are and it really is crazy soft. I'm glad I bought it. Totally worth it and she gets to sleep comfortably. She's earned it. (After all I have three children and she's a saint with them).
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I’d say just “OK”
customer_reviews.text: Update: taking review down to a 1 star because it’s sinply not as advertised. I purchased this bed solely based on the fact that it is supposed to keep my dog off the hard floors. It doesn’t. At all. He’s large, but I bought the biggest size for him and all his pressure points are still hitting the floor. It’s cheap foam on the inside and my dog rarely uses it anymore. Looking for a better option for him. It’s no where near as thick and far as the pictures show, but it’s still pretty nice. My dog seems to like it, but not as much as my bed!
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Although this bed is very cute and my pets like it, it is a lot smaller than I thought it would be. It came folded up in a tiny box which made the bolsters flat and not as cushion-y as they appear in the pictures. As an owner of 4 pets, a Vet Tech, and a Professional Pet Sitter - I feel that this bed is overpriced for what it is. $15 - 20 would be a more reasonable price point for such a small bed.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: possibly a different bed
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this same bed in 2018 and it was amazing. all dogs in the house loved it. recently my son took the cover off to wash it and one of the new puppies shredded the bed. (just because the cover was off it must have seemed inviting!) so i ordered a replacement one. Before when this was shipped it was shipped flat in a large box. this time it was folded over in a much smaller box. first clue it may not be the same quality. even my son noticed it wasn't as plush and padded. so far the dogs don't seem to notice. but i really think the bed has changed over the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Took a small beating...
customer_reviews.text: My little maltipoo has been enjoying her bed since early July. I finally posted a review to say that so far so good! She loves to rest her head on the sides and sleep/ naps in it well. The video will show u that it has taken a beating with her scratching and tugging at it over time. She has torn the foam inside, but it’s still fluffy like a my pillow. So far no tears but she is little. Not sure if a big dog would have a different affect. Easy 2 zippers for sections for easy washing. Pleased with my purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: angelface

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I feel mixed about this. It's nice appearance and looks to be well stitched and quality fabric (have not washed it yet). However the foam at the bottom is not very dense and I am sure will break down quick once broken in. The bed is extremely light. Due to this the dog has a tendency to move it while getting on and off it. Beds I have gotten in past locally were heafty and had plenty of material. If cover survives.. I will replace internals with something else.
customer_reviews.author: B-man

customer_reviews.title: Three things to note
customer_reviews.text: 1) This is a good protective cover to ensure that it trap everything inside it. 2) downside is that the cover is very tough. Like it makes crinkle noises when the dogs shuffle around to get themselves more comfortable. I’m actually loosing sleep cause I’d wake up to the noise. 3) the other thing is that it’s noT chew proof. My dogs, the little shit that they are, was able to ripped it to shed when I wasn’t home. I reviewed over the camera and I can hear the sound of what you would make if you were eating a giant beef jerky when you rip into it.
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: When I first picked up the package, I did expect it to be a lot more heavier/dense! But I unwrapped it, laid it out, and it’s looks and feels great! My dogs both love it! My black dog is 80 pounds and I got the jumbo size, probably could’ve got the large, but the jumbo is good for her when she sprawls out! Love the color and style! I wasn’t able to find a good looking bed at our local pet stores, so this was great, and even better priced!
customer_reviews.author: Aliciana

customer_reviews.title: A supportive and defined space.
customer_reviews.text: The dog is content, and his "sofa bed" is his home base in the living room. He is 12 and needed some padding to rest on with room to stretch out. We put an older pad that he was familiar with on top of the new bed. When we went on vacation and he went to a friend's house, the bed was easy for his dog-sitter to take in her car and to her house. We have washed the covers with no problem. Fabric cleans easily and shows no stress. Just re-insert the pads and zip back up. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Cat

customer_reviews.title: cat likes , cover nice , interior of arms stuffing could be better
customer_reviews.text: my cat likes it but the borders "arms" are kind of clumpy like they just stuffed it with some material that isn't too squishy - arms are lumpy and not smoothly filled , it almost feels like it was washed and the stuffing got sorta gnarly in there . it's not my preference . exterior materials feel nice , the bottom part he sleeps on is plush looks like it's easily washable (old cat - important to me!) and the bottom egg crate foam interior feels as expected . i just wish the border/arms of the bed were more yummy squishy . but whatever , as i said , jack likes it ..
customer_reviews.author: Lakshman Chandler Moss

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: First, this bed is huge! My German Shepherd can stretch completely out comfortably. It was hilarious to watch when he figured out it was his! He had been in a pen with a nice cedar doghouse under a shelter with another dog, but when she died, we brought him into the garage at night. Now, he’s transitioned into the house and is like a new dog. GSDs should never be in pens. They are unhappy away from the pack, as we have learned. This bed is well-made and looks to hold up nicely. We’ve had it for about two months and he LOVES it, has dug in it and it has no holes.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebem

customer_reviews.title: I got the Jumbo for 2 Whippets & an Italian Greyhound.
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find a bed for Sight hounds because they like a lot of comfort and the ability to stretch out but they also like to have the sides to put their faces on. So many large beds don't come with 3 sides. Our dogs love this! I am going to purchase more of these beds. An added bonus is that we can unzip and wash this one. We Got the Frustration free packing which is a sturdy box and plastic wrap around the bed. If you get the Frustration free packing be careful not to cut the bed. It was nice to have a packing option like this. This was a great shopping experience!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the dog, but the cat loves it too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my craft room so the dog would be able to have someplace soft to lay down instead of on the hardwood floors. The dog seems to be comfortable enough, but she hasn't spent a whole lot of time in it. What surprised me is how much my cat loves it. I find her in this bed all the time. She has several sleeping spots and my own bed was previously her favorite, but now this bed is her favorite. It is not the most attractive pet bed in the world, but it is certainly an excellent value and well-used / loved in this household.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit i am highly impressed with the quality of this dog bed. I've washed the cover several times in the washing machine and it has showed no signs of fraying, pilling or threads coming loose.It does become at bit of a pain to put back on after washing because of slight shrinkage out the dryer, but nothing to make a fuss over. And my little (big) one loves it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richkidd99

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a ton of dog beds, but my dog always prefers the hard floor....go figure. He's going to be 12yrs in Nov 2020, so I wanted something plush for his bones...he seems to like this bed the best I've bought so far. He's a thick haired Doodle, so summer months he prefers the cooler floors, but when it's cold out, he curls up in this the most. the only drawback is the zipper stitching has pulled away from the fabric after only one wash, so it's not made very well. I had to stitch it back together. Otherwise, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BumblB

customer_reviews.title: Big Enough for the Danes
customer_reviews.text: Put together my dog bed frames this morning and I couldn’t be happier. I got the jumbo size and they are perfect for my Danes! The black one is 14 lbs and the other 130 for size reference. I love the mid century look and the assembly wasn’t bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chic dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a chaise style dog bed since I have two very different sized dogs and they both like to lay on each other’s stuff. Since I have Velcro dogs I wanted something that fit underneath my pc setup and this was perfect. The bed itself is very sleek looking. The wine color is very pretty and I love that I can wash the cover separately from the bed. My only caveat is I wish the fabric was a bit thicker since my dogs like to paw at the bed before they settle. Other than that, this bed is awesome and my dogs Zarya and Ciri approve
customer_reviews.author: KitchenWitch

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dog bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. This is the first time her crate has been taken down, and wasn’t sure how she’d adjust to not having it anymore. She got into the bed right away and doesn’t seem to notice or care that the crate is gone! She has joint problems and with the egg crate mattress, it is going to really help her feel more comfortable while sleeping. I love the softness of the cover, the beautiful, rich looking color, the head and back rests are shaped just right. I love this bed! I would definitely recommend this bed for any dog lover! It is definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Labradoodle to have a nice soft place to sleep, since my Jack Russel sleeps on the bed or couch with me. Soon as I put it on the floor they both wanted on it, and my Jack Russel laid down right in the center and actually kicked the Labradoodle off...lol. Now they share it though, and the Labradoodle loves it. Got the jumbo size to make sure when the Labradoodle stops growing(she’s 6 months old now) that she’ll have plenty of room to be comfortable. It seems to be holding up well, not sinking to the floor and the material is fairly strong. We’ll see how it stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly orthopedic...
customer_reviews.text: This came folded up in a box which left it totally mis-shapen and lumpy; not sure how it can be called orthopedic and be lumpy... my dog doesn't seem to mind. I bought the large for our German shepherd but it's a bit small. The fabric is like a microfiber and literally attracts hair to it which is awful for our wood floors and I'm highly considering throwing the thing out and spending the money on something better to contain the dog and the hair!
customer_reviews.author: JLynnRN88

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: This bed cost more than I usually spend on dog beds but my dog loved it immediately! I'm going to order a second one for in our bedroom. She prefers this one over all of her other beds so we are having to bring it with us from room to room. Our spoiled little princess is a 70lb mix to give you an idea of size, we purchased the Jumbo and its perfect. She has plenty of room to stretch out and not be hanging off. It's super soft, looks nice, and the removable, washable cover is a must have to me. Maybe with this new bed we can get our couch back :-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

product_meta.title: Furhaven Pet - Packable Travel Bed, Plush Orthopedic Sofa, L-Shaped Chaise Couch, & Mid-Century Modern Dog Bed Frame for Dogs & Cats - Multiple Styles, Sizes, & Colors
product_meta.description: Size:Small| Style:Orthopedic Foam| Color:(Sofa) Plush ClayPerfect for pets young and old, the Furhaven Orthopedic Ultra Plush Faux Fur & Suede Traditional Sofa-Style Living Room Couch Pet Dog Bed is designed to provide your loved one with maximum comfort for a good night’s rest. With a soft, plush faux fur sleeping surface your dog will be more snug than a bug in a rug! The orthopedic (egg crate) foam base supports your pets joints and pressure points making this pet bed ideal for arthritic pets who have trouble getting comfortable. The Jumbo Plus option, for larger breeds, features solid slab orthopedic foam for greater support and comfort. Give your companion the luxury they deserve with this orthopedic dog bed. They’ll love the suedine bolsters' soft but supportive feel provided on three sides giving them a variety of cozy positions to snuggle into. The bolsters are a great pillow for your pet to lie their head on or, for pets that like to cozy into your couch, they can snuggle close to the sides for a sense of security and warmth. Whatever position your pet likes to lay in, they’ll find nothing but comfort and sweet dreams! With the feel of a couch, your pet will love having their own space to curl into while you’ll love having your favorite spot on the couch back! No more unwanted pet fur and scratches on your furniture. It’s great for older pets who may be unable to jump on the couch and have had to lie on the floor. The sofa-style orthopedic pet bed provides the comfort of a couch without the struggle of getting up there! This deluxe sofa pet bed was also made with you in mind and is available in various stylish colors so you’re sure to find the perfect match for your current decor! For your pet, we offer diverse sizing options so that you can make sure your pet has enough room to fit their preferences for maximum comfort. With a removable and washable cover, this sofa bed is easy to clean! Sleeping has never been so enjoyable for your pet in this deluxe sofa-style orthopedic bed. Your pet won’t need to count sheep to fall soundly asleep on this cozy bed!
feature_bullets: PET FRIENDLY DESIGN: The bed features a classic sofa design with three-sided bolsters that promote security and provide additional high-loft cushion support for head resters, as well as cozy nestling nooks for burrowers

SLEEP SURFACE: The sleep surface is lined with ultra plush faux fur, while the bolsters are wrapped in easy-care micro suede; both are soft-to-touch fabrics that no pet could ever resist snuggling into

EASY ON JOINTS: The egg crate orthopedic foam helps cushion pressure points, distribute body weight, and improve air circulation, while the fluffy-filled bolsters provide optimum support for the neck, back, hips, and joints for a more restful sleep
PRODUCT DETAILS: Clay; Small, 20" x 15" x 5.5" (3" Foam; Sleep Surface: Approx. 15" x 12")
AVAILABLE VARIANTS: The bed comes in Espresso, Clay, Gray, and Deep Pool; it's also available in Small, Medium, Large, Jumbo, and Jumbo Plus
EASY CARE: Pets can present some unique cleaning challenges, which is why Furhaven made sure that the removable dog bed cover is completely machine washable for your convenience
NOT SUITABLE for pets with excessive teething or destructive chewing behavior

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
